segments.text: Hey , Shirley . The party has been wonderful . My husband and my children have enjoyed it very much , and me too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've said you will enjoy your life here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I surely will . By the way , is the party like this held every weekend in our neighborhood ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I've forgotten to tell you . The party is held every other week . And every family gives their own performance each time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My children would like that ; they like dancing very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look ! Who is that guy on the stage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God ! That's my husband , Benjamin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He likes American Idol very much , and he always imitates the contestant at home . I can't believe he got on the stage himself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He performs very well . He is so funny !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , just ignore him . I've noticed there are lots of exercise facilities in our community . After dinner you can go there for a walk with your family !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , that's perfect ! By the way , is there any playground in our neighborhood ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there is one behind our building . And you can play tennis there . But if you want to play tennis there , they will change you 30 Yuan per hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , got it ! Thank you so much . You have helped me a lot !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome ! We are neighbors !
segments.speaker: S2
